channel.title: [Poem] Old Depression
channel.description:
[i] There once was an old geezer who sat on the street, Nothing to do, and nothing to eat. He lay there, cold and grey, Until he was found, dead in May.
The old man, taught us a lot. Taught us depression, and how to rot. He might have been a great guy, but nobody knows. All he did, was lay and doze. It's a shame that the poor old man died, One day we will too, Let's make it a fun ride. [/i]
Also boredom. ... naw it's fun to come up with weird stuff lol.
~Ron
I wonder if some weirdo kid will post a picture about Emo threads or some woman thats beaten up... (talking to you paul :p)

item.title: [Poem] Old Depression
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

yna_ajhear5:

It doesn’t have to!

Yeah it could be one of those poems that are just 1 big paragraph and you could talk about something weird like a flower or a crazy old man lol.

I love spontaneous poems made by teenagers cause they are normally funny lol.

~Ron[br][size=1]Posted at: May 23, 2006, 11:47:03 pm[/size][hr][quote=“jme_009, post:2, topic:3233”]I need to write a poem for my friends funeral, I suck at poetry >.<

Nice job![/quote]
Thank you jme! and good luck with your poem man. Hope it’s wonderful!

item.title: [Poem] Old Depression
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[i]
There once was an old geezer who sat on the street,
Nothing to do, and nothing to eat.
He lay there, cold and grey,
Until he was found, dead in May.

The old man, taught us a lot.
Taught us depression, and how to rot.
He might have been a great guy, but nobody knows.
All he did, was lay and doze.
It’s a shame that the poor old man died,
One day we will too, Let’s make it a fun ride.
[/i]

Also boredom. … naw it’s fun to come up with weird stuff lol.

~Ron

I wonder if some weirdo kid will post a picture about Emo threads or some woman thats beaten up… (talking to you paul :p)
